def has_book_on_surface(surface:item):
    # Function to check if there is a book on a specified surface
    symbol has_book=exists o: item : is_book(o) and on(o, surface)
    return has_book

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists surface: item : surfaces(surface) and has_book_on_surface(surface):
            # Check if there is a surface with a book based on the available information
            bind surface: item where:
                surfaces(surface) and has_book_on_surface(surface)
            # Select a surface that has a book on it
            achieve close_char(char, surface)
            # Move the character closer to the surface with the book

        else: 
           # If no surface with a book is found, initiate exploration to locate one
            foreach surface: item:
                if surfaces(surface) and not visited(surface):
                    # Check all unvisited surfaces
                    observe(surface,"Check is there any book on the surface")
                    # Observe whether each surface has a book
